column1: @tyleroakley I'm going to log off for the evening and watch the news about the CoronaVirus. What will Lester Holt say this time? STAY STRONG, STAY HEALTHY, and LET MY NEW TUMBLR POSTS HELP YOU STAY ENTERTAINED. I'll talk to you tomorrow about what tomorrow's storms are doing.
Darn you, CoronaVirus! Why have you not died yet, you vile virus, you? Let's give it some more time and maye it will be gone in several months!
